title: Destructuring Arrays and Slices in Rust
description: In this lab, you can learn about how arrays and slices can be destructured in Rust, demonstrated through a code example that showcases different patterns for matching values in the array and binding them to variables.

meta.title: Mastering Destructuring Arrays and Slices in Rust
meta.description: Explore the art of destructuring arrays and slices in Rust, a powerful programming language, through a comprehensive code example.
meta.keywords: rust playground, destructuring, arrays, rust tutor, slices, rust online compiler, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online
